snippet.title: Infected Shelter  - PAX East 2019 Trailer - Coming Soon to Early Access
snippet.description:
Infected Shelter - the post-apocalyptic rogue-lite game developed by Dark Blue Games - is coming soon to Steam Early Access.

Platforms: Windows PC, Mac, Linux. Later: Nintendo Switch, PlayStation 4, Xbox One.

Wishlist the game on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/926390/Infected_Shelter/
Subscribe to our mailing list: http://infectedshelter.com

Thank you for your support!
